## Variables

N: fixed by experimentor

p: Prior probability

W: A probability distribution given the data. 

## Joint model

W ~ Binomial(N , p)

p ~ Uniform(0, 1)

W is distributed binomially with N observations and probability p on each

p is distributed uniformally at 1
